text: Kalle Lehtinen (born 12 October 1968) is a retired Finnish football midfielder.Weltfussball He is the father of Alex Lehtinen. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish footballers Category:FC Kontu players Category:FC Kuusysi players Category:FC Locarno players Category:FinnPa players Category:Helsingin Jalkapalloklubi players Category:PK-35 Vantaa players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Finnish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Switzerland Category:Finnish expatriate sportspeople in Switzerland Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Finland under-21 international footballers
title: Kalle Lehtinen
